# iOS App Store Configuration

This directory contains iOS-specific configuration files for the NIJA mobile app.

## Required Files (Generated by Capacitor)

After running `npm run cap:add:ios`, the following will be generated:
- `App/App/Info.plist` - iOS app configuration
- `App/App/Assets.xcassets` - App icons and images
- `App/App.xcodeproj` - Xcode project file

## Privacy Descriptions (Info.plist)

The following privacy descriptions are required for App Store submission:

```xml
<key>NSCameraUsageDescription</key>
<string>We need camera access to scan QR codes for API key configuration.</string>

<key>NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription</key>
<string>We need access to your photo library to save trading charts and reports.</string>

<key>NSFaceIDUsageDescription</key>
<string>We use Face ID to securely authenticate you and protect your trading account.</string>

<key>NSUserTrackingUsageDescription</key>
<string>We use tracking to improve app performance and provide personalized trading insights.</string>

<key>NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription</key>
<string>Location is used to comply with regional trading regulations.</string>
```

## App Transport Security

For production API access:

```xml
<key>NSAppTransportSecurity</key>
<dict>
    <key>NSAllowsArbitraryLoads</key>
    <false/>
    <key>NSExceptionDomains</key>
    <dict>
        <key>your-api-domain.com</key>
        <dict>
            <key>NSExceptionAllowsInsecureHTTPLoads</key>
            <false/>
            <key>NSIncludesSubdomains</key>
            <true/>
            <key>NSExceptionMinimumTLSVersion</key>
            <string>TLSv1.2</string>
        </dict>
    </dict>
</dict>
```

## Required Capabilities

Enable in Xcode:
- ✅ Push Notifications
- ✅ Background Modes (Remote notifications)
- ✅ Network Extensions (for secure API calls)

## App Icons

Required sizes for iOS:
- 1024x1024 (App Store)
- 180x180 (iPhone)
- 167x167 (iPad Pro)
- 152x152 (iPad)
- 120x120 (iPhone)
- 87x87 (iPhone)
- 80x80 (iPad)
- 76x76 (iPad)
- 60x60 (iPhone)
- 58x58 (iPhone)
- 40x40 (iPhone/iPad)
- 29x29 (iPhone/iPad)
- 20x20 (iPhone/iPad)

## Launch Screen

Configure in `App/App/Base.lproj/LaunchScreen.storyboard`:
- Background color: #0f172a
- Logo centered
- App name below logo
- Loading indicator

## Build Configuration

### Development Build
```bash
npm run ios:build
```

### Production Build (Archive)
1. Open Xcode: `npx cap open ios`
2. Select "Any iOS Device" as target
3. Product > Archive
4. Upload to App Store Connect

## Versioning

Update in `capacitor.config.json`:
```json
{
  "ios": {
    "version": "1.0.0",
    "buildNumber": "1"
  }
}
```

## Code Signing

Required for distribution:
1. Apple Developer Account ($99/year)
2. Distribution Certificate
3. Provisioning Profile
4. App ID: com.nija.trading

## TestFlight

For beta testing:
1. Archive app in Xcode
2. Upload to App Store Connect
3. Submit for TestFlight review
4. Invite internal/external testers

## App Store Submission Checklist

- [ ] App screenshots (6.7", 6.5", 5.5" displays)
- [ ] App preview video (optional but recommended)
- [ ] App description (4000 chars max)
- [ ] Keywords (100 chars max)
- [ ] Support URL
- [ ] Privacy Policy URL
- [ ] Age rating questionnaire
- [ ] App category: Finance
- [ ] Pricing: Free with In-App Purchases
- [ ] App Store Connect agreement signed
